text: Jis kaam mein safalta ki sambhavna na ho, use bhi poori mehnat se karna hi asli sangharsh hai.
author: Swami Vivekananda

text: Khud ko kamzor samajhna sabse bada paap hai.
author: Swami Vivekananda

text: Sapne wo nahi jo hum sote waqt dekhte hain, sapne wo hain jo hume sone nahi dete.
author: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

text: Agar aap suraj ki tarah chamakna chahte hain, to pehle suraj ki tarah jalna seekhiye.
author: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

text: Jo badlav aap duniya mein dekhna chahte hain, vo pehle khud baniye.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Kisi cheez ka intezaar mat karo, jitna jaldi ho sake shuru karo.
author: Ratan Tata

text: Log aapke aatm-vishwas aur aatm-sanyam se prerna lete hain.
author: Narendra Modi

text: Kadi mehnat ka koi vikalp nahi hota.

text: Safalta ek din mein nahi milti, lekin ek din zaroor milti hai.

text: Jeevan mein kathinaaiyaan hume majboot banne ka mauka deti hain.
